013package org.apache.juneau.rest.client.remote;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.http.HttpHeaders.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
019
020import java.lang.reflect.*;
021import java.util.*;
022
023import org.apache.juneau.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.http.header.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.http.remote.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
029
030/**
031 * Contains the meta-data about a REST proxy class.
032 *
033 * <p>
034 * Captures the information in {@link org.apache.juneau.http.remote.Remote @Remote} and {@link org.apache.juneau.http.remote.RemoteOp @RemoteOp} annotations for
035 * caching and reuse.
036 *
037 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
038 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/RestProxyBasics">REST Proxies</a>
039 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestClientBasics">juneau-rest-client</a>
040 * </ul>
041 */
042public class RemoteMeta {
043
044   private final Map<Method,RemoteOperationMeta> operations;
045   private final HeaderList headers;
046
047   /**
048    * Constructor.
049    *
050    * @param c The interface class annotated with a {@link org.apache.juneau.http.remote.Remote @Remote} annotation (optional).
051    */
052   public RemoteMeta(Class<?> c) {
053      String path = "";
054
055      ClassInfo ci = ClassInfo.of(c);
056      List<Remote> remotes = ci.getAnnotations(Remote.class);
057
058      String versionHeader = "Client-Version", clientVersion = null;
059      HeaderList headers = HeaderList.create().resolving();
060
061      for (Remote r : remotes) {
062         if (isNotEmpty(r.path()))
063            path = StringUtils.trimSlashes(resolve(r.path()));
064         for (String h : r.headers())
065            headers.append(stringHeader(resolve(h)));
066         if (isNotEmpty(r.version()))
067            clientVersion = resolve(r.version());
068         if (isNotEmpty(r.versionHeader()))
069            versionHeader = resolve(r.versionHeader());
070         if (isNotVoid(r.headerList())) {
071            try {
072               headers.append(r.headerList().getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance().getAll());
073            } catch (Exception e) {
074               throw new BasicRuntimeException(e, "Could not instantiate HeaderSupplier class");
075            }
076         }
077      }
078
079      if (clientVersion != null)
080         headers.append(stringHeader(versionHeader, clientVersion));
081
082      Map<Method,RemoteOperationMeta> operations = map();
083      String path2 = path;
084      ci.forEachPublicMethod(
085         x -> true,
086         x -> operations.put(x.inner(), new RemoteOperationMeta(path2, x.inner(), "GET"))
087      );
088
089      this.operations = u(operations);
090      this.headers = headers;
091   }
092
093   /**
094    * Returns the metadata about the specified operation on this resource proxy.
095    *
096    * @param m The method to look up.
097    * @return Metadata about the method or <jk>null</jk> if no metadata was found.
098    */
099   public RemoteOperationMeta getOperationMeta(Method m) {
100      return operations.get(m);
101   }
102
103   /**
104    * Returns the headers to set on all requests.
105    *
106    * @return The headers to set on all requests.
107    */
108   public HeaderList getHeaders() {
109      return headers;
110   }
111
112   //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
113   // Helper methods.
114   //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
115
116   private static String resolve(String s) {
117      return VarResolver.DEFAULT.resolve(s);
118   }
119}
